posts.title: INTERNSHIP POSTS
posts.heading: Employer Internship Portal
posts.description: Welcome to the Employer Dashboard where you can create and manage internship opportunities for talented GUC students.

features.createListings: Create detailed internship listings with custom titles and descriptions
features.specifySkills: Specify required skills, qualifications, and preferred majors
features.setTimeframes: Set clear timeframes, work settings (remote/hybrid/on-site), and compensation details
features.addCompanyInfo: Add company information and supervisor contacts

posts.connectionNote: Our platform connects you directly with pre-screened, motivated students whose skills and interests align with your organization's needs.
posts.searchPlaceholder: Search internships by job title, description, skills...
posts.createFirstMessage: Create your first post to get started
posts.noMatchingPosts: No posts found matching your criteria
posts.adjustSearchFilter: Try adjusting your search or filter

form.skillsPlaceholder: Type a skill and press Enter (e.g., JavaScript, React, UI/UX)

browse.title: BROWSE INTERNSHIPS
browse.heading: Company Internship Explorer
browse.description: Browse internship opportunities posted by partner organizations across industries and locations.

benefitsPlus.identifyPartners: This explorer helps you identify potential internship partners and examine their past engagement with SCAD students.
benefitsPlus.discoverLeaders: Discover industry leaders and hidden gems that align with your students' career interests.

browse.note: Note: All displayed companies have been vetted by SCAD and maintain active partnerships with our institution.
browse.searchPlaceholder: Search internships by job title or company name ...

benefits.talentedStudents: Access to talented students with specialized skills
benefits.futureTalent: Potential to develop future full-time talent

browse.addListingNote: To add your own internship listing, use the "Post New Internship" option in your company dashboard.

applications.title: APPLICATIONS MANAGEMENT
applications.heading: Applicant Management Portal
applications.description: Monitor and evaluate all student applications to your posted internship opportunities in one centralized location.

features.viewApplications: View all applications organized by position and submission date
features.accessProfiles: Access comprehensive candidate profiles and application materials
features.reviewDocuments: Review attached documents (resumes, portfolios, cover letters)
features.exploreLinks: Explore professional social links and relevant student work
features.trackStatus: Track application status (new, reviewed, interviewed, selected, declined)

applications.standardizedNote: All application materials are presented in a standardized format for efficient comparison while preserving each student's unique presentation style.
applications.privacyNotice: Privacy Notice: Student information is protected and should only be used for evaluation purposes related to your internship opportunities.
applications.searchPlaceholder: Search by name, email, or position...

interns.title: INTERN MANAGEMENT DASHBOARD
interns.heading: Intern Management Dashboard
interns.description: This comprehensive view displays all SCAD students who have interned with your organization across all programs and time periods.

categories.current: Current Interns: Students actively working in their positions
categories.completed: Completed Internships: Past interns awaiting evaluation
categories.evaluated: Evaluated Interns: Students with completed feedback assessments

features.filter: Filter students by department, position, time period, or evaluation status

interns.note: Note: Student information is protected and should be handled according to your confidentiality agreement with SCAD.
interns.searchPlaceholder: Search interns by name, department, position...

evaluations.title: EVALUATION PORTAL
evaluations.heading: Your Student Evaluation Portal
evaluations.description: Provide valuable feedback on interns who have completed positions at your organization. Your assessments help shape students' professional development and inform future placements.

features.assessTechnical: Assess technical skills relevant to the position
features.provideExamples: Provide specific examples of achievements and areas for growth
features.answerQuestions: Answer structured questions about performance and potential
features.addComments: Add private comments for school administrators (optional)

evaluations.confidentialityNote: Evaluations remain confidential between your company and authorized faculty and SCAD members.

features.reviewReports: Review student internship reports pending evaluation

studentEvaluations.title: Review Internship Evaluation Reports
studentEvaluations.description: Browse and access evaluations submitted by students regarding their internship experiences. View ratings, company information, and detailed feedback per student.

features.searchSortDescription: Easily search evaluations by student name, company, or supervisor to quickly access relevant reports.
features.fullReportDescription: View the student's full evaluation including their feedback, company details, main supervisor, and internship duration.

studentEvaluations.qualityNote: These evaluations contribute to enhancing internship quality and guide future students in making informed choices.

statistics.title: Real-Time Statistics & Reporting

features.trackReports: Track accepted, rejected, and flagged reports per internship cycle

features.viewTopCourses: View top courses most used in internships
features.discoverTopCompanies: Discover top-rated companies based on student evaluations
features.identifyParticipation: Identify companies with highest internship participation

statistics.strategicNote: Generate comprehensive reports based on real-time statistics for strategic decision making.

companyReview.title: Company Partnership Review Portal
companyReview.description: Efficiently manage and evaluate organization applications for SCAD internship partnerships. Review company profiles, internship offerings, and historical performance data to make informed decisions.

features.reviewApplications: Comprehensive review of new company applications and profiles
features.evaluateQuality: Evaluation of internship quality and alignment with academic requirements
features.studentFeedback: Student feedback integration and satisfaction metrics
features.partnershipTracking: Partnership history tracking and renewal management

companyReview.qualityNote: Maintain high-quality internship opportunities by thoroughly assessing each company's offerings, workplace environment, and student development potential.

infoCard.title: Student Directory Management
infoCard.description: Access comprehensive profiles of all SCAD students registered in the internship system for academic support and opportunity matching.

items.academicDetails: Academic details (major, minor, expected graduation date)

infoCard.privacyNotice: Privacy Notice: Access to student information is restricted to authorized personnel and subject to educational privacy regulations. Use information only for legitimate educational purposes.

management.title: Internship Listings Management
management.description: Monitor and oversee all active internship opportunities posted by approved partner companies across the platform.

features.title: Oversight Features:
features.viewDetails: View complete details of all current internship listings
features.filterOpportunities: Filter opportunities by company, industry, location, or status
features.verifyCompliance: Verify compliance with posting guidelines and requirements
features.reviewCompensation: Review compensation details and working conditions
features.ensureSkills: Ensure appropriate skill level requirements and educational alignment

management.note: This dashboard enables SCAD administrators to maintain the quality and integrity of all internship opportunities available to students, ensuring they align with educational objectives and professional standards.

evaluationAnalytics.title: EVALUATION ANALYTICS
evaluationAnalytics.description: Access and analyze student feedback on internship experiences to maintain quality partnerships and inform faculty advisors.

items.assessments: View comprehensive student assessments of partner companies
items.ratings: Monitor ratings across key metrics (mentorship, learning environment, workload)
items.themes: Track recurring themes in qualitative feedback
items.companies: Identify standout companies and those requiring intervention
items.trends: Compare evaluation trends across industries and time periods

evaluationAnalytics.importantNote: Important: Student evaluations play a critical role in determining future partnership renewals and informing curriculum development.

statisticsDashboard.title: STATISTICS DASHBOARD
statisticsDashboard.description: Comprehensive analytics platform for monitoring internship program performance metrics and trends.

items.realtime: Real-time dashboard with visual reports and metrics
items.topPerformers: Top companies and courses based on student performance
items.tracking: Internship report status tracking across academic cycles
items.faculty: Faculty review time analysis and efficiency metrics
items.reports: Exportable PDF reports for academic administration

statisticsDashboard.note: Use this analytics suite to identify trends, measure program effectiveness, and make data-driven decisions to improve internship outcomes.

reportView.title: STUDENT REPORTS REVIEW
reportView.description: Manage and distribute student internship reports to appropriate faculty members for academic evaluation and feedback.

items.access: Access all submitted student internship reports organized by department and date
items.status: View report status (pending, flagged, rejected, accepted)
items.assign: Assign reports to specific faculty reviewers based on expertise
items.monitor: Monitor faculty review timelines and completion rates
items.track: Track report revision cycles and resubmissions

items.standards: Ensure workshop content aligns with industry standards and emerging trends
items.quality: Maintain quality and consistency across all professional development offerings
items.coordinate: Coordinate with industry presenters and faculty facilitators
items.update: Update content as needed based on student feedback and industry changes

reportView.academicNote: These reports represent the academic culmination of students' internship experiences, connecting professional practice with classroom learning.

comments.title: Comments
comments.noComments: No comments yet. Select text to add highlights or comments.

management.title: WORKSHOP MANAGEMENT
management.description: Create, schedule, and manage professional development workshops that enhance student career readiness and industry preparation.

features.title: Workshop Creation Tools:
features.designNewWorkshop: Design new workshop listings with detailed descriptions and learning objectives
features.scheduleSessions: Schedule sessions with flexible timing options (live, recurring, or on-demand)
features.uploadMaterials: Upload materials, presentations, and supplementary resources
features.setCapacityLimits: Set capacity limits and registration requirements
features.designateWorkshops: Designate workshops for specific student segments or Pro membership

contentControl.title: Content Control:
contentControl.ensureWorkshopContent: Ensure workshop content aligns with industry standards and emerging trends
contentControl.maintainQuality: Maintain quality and consistency across all professional development offerings
contentControl.coordinateWithIndustry: Coordinate with industry presenters and faculty facilitators
contentControl.updateContent: Update content as needed based on student feedback and industry changes

management.note: This centralized system streamlines the entire workshop lifecycle from creation through evaluation, ensuring valuable professional development opportunities for all students.

validation.agendaRequired: At least one agenda item is required
validation.endDateAfterStart: End time must be after start time

personalizedCard.title: Your Personalized Internship Matches
personalizedCard.description: This page showcases internship opportunities specifically curated for you based on your unique profile and preferences.

howItWorks.title: How These Recommendations Work:
howItWorks.jobInterests: Matched to your specified job interests and career goals
howItWorks.industries: Filtered by your preferred industries and work environments
howItWorks.ratings: Includes positions highly rated by previous SCAD interns
howItWorks.updates: Updated regularly as new opportunities become available

personalizedCard.footer: Take time to explore these tailored suggestions—they represent opportunities where your specific talents and interests could truly shine.

browseInternshipsPersonalizedCard.title: Browse Career-Building Internships
browseInternshipsPersonalizedCard.description: Explore curated internship opportunities provided by SCAD and our partner companies. These positions are designed to give you real-world experience while building your professional portfolio.

howItWorks.title: Why These Opportunities Matter:
howItWorks.potential: Potential for academic credit and professional references
howItWorks.networking: Networking connections that could lead to full-time employment
howItWorks.portfolio: Portfolio-building projects to showcase your skills

browseInternshipsPersonalizedCard.footer: Remember to watch our informational video "What Makes Your Internship Count" to learn how to maximize your internship experience!

appliedInternshipsPersonalizedCard.title: Your Internship Applications
appliedInternshipsPersonalizedCard.description: Track and manage all your internship applications in one centralized dashboard.

howItWorks.pendingDescription: Pending applications are still being reviewed by companies
howItWorks.acceptedDescription: Accepted applications mean you've qualified for the next steps
howItWorks.rejectedDescription: Rejected applications weren't successful this time
howItWorks.finalizedDescription: Finalized applications are confirmed and ready to start

appliedInternshipsPersonalizedCard.footer: Use the filters to sort through your applications by company, position, or status!

myInternshipsPersonalizedCard.title: Your Internships Dashboard
myInternshipsPersonalizedCard.description: Manage all your internships in one place.

howItWorks.completedDescription: Completed internships are awaiting your report and evaluation submissions
howItWorks.evaluatedDescription: Evaluated ones have been reviewed by your supervisor

myInternshipsPersonalizedCard.footer: Use the filters to sort through your internship history or search for specific opportunities.

evaluationsPersonalizedCard.title: Your Evaluations
evaluationsPersonalizedCard.description: Manage your evaluations for companies where you completed internships. Track both submitted and draft evaluations here.

howItWorks.submittedDescription: Evaluations you have completed and submitted for your internship experiences.
howItWorks.draftDescription: Evaluations you've started but haven't submitted yet. Continue working on these.

evaluationsPersonalizedCard.footer: Your evaluations provide valuable feedback to companies and help future students make informed decisions.

myReportsPersonalizedCard.title: Student Report Management System
myReportsPersonalizedCard.description: Welcome to your Student Report Dashboard. Here you can monitor and manage all your internship reports in one place.

howItWorks.pendingDescription2: Your report has been submitted but not yet reviewed. No action required.
howItWorks.flaggedDescription2: Review faculty feedback and resubmit your updated report.
howItWorks.rejectedDescription2: Did not meet requirements. See faculty comments for guidance.
howItWorks.acceptedDescription2: Your report has been approved. No further action is needed.

workshopsInfoPersonalizedCard.title: Workshops & Professional Development Hub
workshopsInfoPersonalizedCard.description: Enhance your skills and expand your professional knowledge through our comprehensive workshop center.

availableWorkshops.title: Available Workshop Types:
availableWorkshops.type1Description: Browse and register for scheduled future sessions
availableWorkshops.type2Description: Join active workshops happening in real-time

workshopBenefits.title: Workshop Benefits:
workshopBenefits.benefit1: Build industry-specific skills valued by employers
workshopBenefits.benefit2: Learn practical techniques from working professionals
workshopBenefits.benefit3: Network with industry representatives and peers
workshopBenefits.benefit4: Receive certificates of completion for your portfolio

workshopsInfoPersonalizedCard.footer: Each workshop is carefully designed to address critical skills and knowledge areas that complement your academic learning and prepare you for professional success.

notificationsPersonalizedInfoCard.title: Notifications Center
notificationsPersonalizedInfoCard.description: Stay informed and never miss important updates related to your professional development journey.

notificationHub.title: Your Notification Hub:
notificationHub.type1Description: Status changes and feedback on your internship applications
notificationHub.type2Description: New comments or status changes on your submitted reports
notificationHub.type3Description: Upcoming sessions you've registered for and last-minute availabilities
notificationHub.type4Description: Important dates for application submissions and report due dates
notificationHub.type5Description: New internships or workshops matching your profile
notificationHub.type6Description: Exclusive workshops and events for Pro students only

notificationsPersonalizedInfoCard.footer: Some workshop notifications are exclusively for students with Pro membership. Upgrade your account to access these premium professional development opportunities.

onlineAssessmentsInfoCard.title: Online Assessments Center
onlineAssessmentsInfoCard.description: Discover your professional strengths and preferences through our comprehensive assessment tools.

assessmentBenefits.title: Assessment Benefits:
assessmentBenefits.benefit1: Gain valuable insights into your natural strengths and work preferences
assessmentBenefits.benefit2: Receive personalized internship and workshop recommendations
assessmentBenefits.benefit3: Better articulate your unique qualities to potential employers
assessmentBenefits.benefit4: Identify career paths that align with your personality and aptitudes

personalityAssessment.title: Personality Assessment
personalityAssessment.description: Understand your work style and team dynamics preferences

skillsProficiency.title: Skills Proficiency
skillsProficiency.description: Measure your technical and soft skills competency levels

careerInterestInventory.title: Career Interest Inventory
careerInterestInventory.description: Discover fields and roles that match your interests

aptitudeIndicators.title: Aptitude Indicators
aptitudeIndicators.description: Identify your natural abilities across different domains

onlineAssessmentsInfoCard.footer: Results are analyzed to create your personalized profile that helps tailor recommendations throughout the platform.

profilePersonalizedCard.title: Student Profile Management
profilePersonalizedCard.description: Your professional profile is your digital portfolio and the foundation of your career development journey.

whyYourProfileMatters.title: Why Your Profile Matters:
whyYourProfileMatters.point1: Powers the personalized recommendation engine for internships and workshops
whyYourProfileMatters.point2: Visible to potential employers when you apply for positions
whyYourProfileMatters.point3: Helps faculty provide more targeted guidance and support
whyYourProfileMatters.point4: Creates a foundation for your professional brand development

profilePersonalizedCard.remember: Remember: Update your profile regularly to reflect new skills, experiences, and career goals as you grow professionally.

reportCards.appealSuccessMessage: Your appeal has been submitted and is pending review.

statusTooltips.accepted: Your report has been reviewed and approved by the faculty member. No further action is required for this submission.
statusTooltips.pending: Your report has been submitted but not yet reviewed by the responsible faculty member. No action is required at this time.
statusTooltips.flagged: Your report requires revisions based on faculty feedback. Review the comments provided and resubmit your updated report.
statusTooltips.rejected: Your report did not meet the requirements and cannot be resubmitted. See faculty comments for explanation and guidance on next steps.
